B

beginExecution(Player, Player) - Static method in class com.chat.app.execution.v1.MessageTaskExecutor
BeginExecution method starts two threads for the two instances of Player class respectively and internally calls messagingService's initiateCommunication method to initiate the communication between two objects.

MessageTaskExecutor - Class in com.chat.app.execution.v1
This is the main class that is being used for initializing communication between the two instances of Player class in same process Package V1 has the execution class related to communication in same java process.
MessageTaskExecutor() - Constructor for class com.chat.app.execution.v1.MessageTaskExecutor
 
MessageTaskExecutorClient - Class in com.chat.app.execution.v2
MessageTaskExecutionClient is responsible for making connection with the ExecutionServer, sending and receiving messages from the server.
MessageTaskExecutorClient() - Constructor for class com.chat.app.execution.v2.MessageTaskExecutorClient
 
MessageTaskExecutorServer - Class in com.chat.app.execution.v2
This class acts as a server and accepts connections with client and runs a ClientHandler thread for each client connection established.
MessageTaskExecutorServer() - Constructor for class com.chat.app.execution.v2.MessageTaskExecutorServer
